text: @realDonaldTrump For memorial day weekend. Number of deaths in Korean War+Vietnam+Iraqi Freedom = 800 LESS deaths than the coronavirus. Let that sink in. We are NOT on a path to "greatness" whatever the hell that is... https://t.co/OCbs5axO7Q
